title: Physical Assessment Skills Training Program for Pharmacy Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of physiology and pharmacology
context.additional_context: Conducting Practice-Centered Education Using Digital Devices for Current Practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can accurately identify eight major abnormal lung and heart sounds using simulation stethoscopes
Participants can apply physical assessment skills with over 90% accuracy during patient scenario-based problem-solving processes
Participants demonstrate confidence of at least 4 points (on a 5-point Likert scale) in their physical assessment performance abilities after completing the training
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
